Class ESAPI

public class ESAPI

ESAPI locator class is provided to make it easy to gain access to the current ESAPI classes in use.

Method Summary
static SFDCAccessController accessController()
           
static SFDCEncoder encoder()
           
static SFDCValidator validator()
           

Method Detail

validator

public static SFDCValidator validator()
Returns:
the current ESAPI SFDCValidator being used to validate data in this application.

encoder

public static SFDCEncoder encoder()
Returns:
the current SFDCEncoder object. This gives the basic encoding functionality as those availabel in VisualForce (HTMLENCODE, JSENCODE, JSINHTMLENCODE and URLENCODE)

accessController

public static SFDCAccessController accessController()
Returns:
the current ESAPI SFDCAccessController object being used to maintain the access control rules for this application.
